item.title: META, SNAP, GOOG Stocks Fall After New York Mandates Mental Health Warnings On Social Media Platforms
item.description: The new legislation requires social media platforms that offer “addictive feeds, auto play or infinite scroll” to post warning labels on their platfor...

item.title: Former ULA Chief Tory Bruno Roped In At Bezos’ Blue Origin Amid Intensifying Launch Race
item.description: Tory will serve as President of Blue Origin’s newly formed national security group.

item.title: Sable Offshore Stock Eyes Worst Day In A Month As Lawsuit Targets Trump Administration’s Pipeline Restart Approval
item.description: The stock pullback reflects renewed uncertainty around regulatory and legal hurdles tied to Sable’s main producing asset.

item.title: What Are Meme Stocks?

item.title: American Airlines Stock Slides As Winter Storm Chaos Cancels Over 1,500 Flights During Holiday Rush
item.description: Airline operations were tested at the height of holiday travel as severe weather forced carriers to juggle disruptions.
